name: WordTrainer
0:
”Alexa, open word trainer”
”Alexa tell word trainer I want to play”
”Alexa tell word trainer to start a game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word trainer
des: Alexa will present two words. Learn to identify how consonants and vowels sound by comparing the two words
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
